overview: Feliciano Centurión: abrazo íntimo/al natural explores the life of Feliciano Centurión, a Paraguayan artist who developed his career in Buenos Aires during the 1980s and 1990s. The film serves as an affective exercise with valuable archival material, as Feliciano, his work and his time are revisited through the memories of his Paraguayan and Argentine friends.
title: Feliciano Centurión: abrazo íntimo/al natural
